wikitext.*:
'''Nenuvar''' were most likely the [[fays]] of [[Lilies|lily]]-ponds, according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] associated with ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.<ref name=Nen>{{PE|14}}, "[[The Creatures of the Earth]]", pp. 7, 10</ref>

== Etymology ==
The name ''Nenuvar'' is in [[Qenya]], with the word ''[[nénuvar]]'' meaning "pool of lilies" in the ''[[Qenya Lexicon]]'',<ref name=Nen/> being derived from the root [[NENE]] ("flow?").<ref>{{PE|12}}, entry '''NENE''', p. 65</ref>
